product_name: Black Diamond Innova 50 Pack - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Black Diamond Innova 50 pack for women is ready to head into the wilderness. Innova 50 offers amazing load carrying support and a wide range of free mobility for the wearer. An ideal blend of volume, comfort and mobility lets you bring everything you need without slowing you down or limiting your range of motion. ergoACTIV suspension, OpenAir back panel and soft, 3D mesh lining on hipbelt and shoulder straps provides topnotch support and comfort. Women's-specific shoulder straps are designed to comfortably fit a woman's body. Interchangeable hipbelt can be removed or switched out to customize the fit. Top-loading pack body features a floating lid to accommodate large or small loads. Hipbelt stash pocket, side stretch pockets and front compression stretch pocket offer plenty of storage for water bottles, snacks and other essentials. Retractable tool loops and removable pad straps allow ice axes, trekking poles and sleeping pad to be lashed to the outside of the pack. The Black Diamond Innova 60 pack is constructed with 210-denier ripstop nylon and 420-denier nylon twill to cut weight without sacrificing durability. Closeout.
short_description: The Black Diamond Innova 50 pack for women is ready to head into the wilderness.
